review_data.content: No fuss dining experience for quick fix lunch as the restaurant is crowded during lunch time and turnover is quick. So no problem getting a table. The wrap was yummy and filling.

review_data.title: Below average
review_data.content: The shawarma wrap was average. The chicken was more towards the dry side "biscuit". No tahina, no garlic paste a lot of French Fries, which was a disappoint for me. The name is Lebanese, the flavor was very bland.
